
public class BuddleSort {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		int[] data= {3,23,54,33,5,7,46,99,35,15,74};
		int temp;
		for(int i=0; i<data.length-1; i++) {
			for(int j=0; j<data.length-1-i; j++) {
				if(data[j]>data[j+1]) {
					temp=data[j];
					data[j]=data[j+1];
					data[j+1]=temp;
				}
			}
			
			
			for(int k:data) {
				System.out.print(" "+k);
			}
			System.out.println("");
		}		
	}

}
